        public PointF getRelativePositionOfGeoPointInBoundingBoxWithLinearInterpolation(double aLatitude,
                                                                                double aLongitude,
                                                                                PointF reuse)
        Parameters:
        aLatitude -
        aLongitude -
        reuse -
        Returns:
        relative position determined from the upper left corner.
        {0,0} would be the upper left corner. {1,1} would be the lower right corner. {1,0} would be the lower left corner. {0,1} would be the upper right corner.
